useroptions-template-description:
Companion : sheet for playable animal, monster or other
NPC : sheet for Non Playable Character
PC : sheet for Playable Character
useroptions-health-description:
Standard : life points & nonlethal damage
Alternative : wound points & vigor
useroptions-attack-roll-description:
No targeting : Damage roll must be done manually ( show roll values needed )
Targeting : a target is required for an attack or incantation roll; the damage roll are calculated automatically
useroptions-whisper-description:
Everyone : the message is sent to all players
Game Master : only the Game Master receives messages
useroptions-status-description:
enable or disable the management of all statuses
( including Aging, Armor penalty, Encumbrance and Wound threshold )
useroptions-status-aging-description: enable or disable the management of status related to the age of the character
useroptions-status-armor-penalty-descrip:
enable or disable armor penalty management for the armor pieces
( Armor Bonus and Maximum Dexterity Bonus )
useroptions-status-encumbrance-descripti: enable or disable Encumbrance management for weapon, armor and equipment
useroptions-status-wound-threshold-descr: enable or disable wound threshold for starndard health type
useroptions-unit-decimal-description: be careful, the web browser can display float numbers in number inputs differently than local configuration and show an error
useroptions-unit-thousand-description: be careful, the web browser can display float numbers in number inputs differently than local configuration and show an error
option-compendium-height-title: enable or disable Damage and Weight Adjustment by Size Category
option-compendium-unit-title: enable or disable the conversion of units of size and weight according to the options
option-attack-roll-title:
Dice Throw

Targeting :
 a target is required for an attack or incantation roll
 ( the damage roll are calculated automatically )

No targeting :
 Damage roll must be done manually
option-template-title:
model of the character sheet

Companion :
 animal, monster or other

NPC :
 Non Playable Character

PC :
 Playable Character
option-template-life-title:
management of the character's Life

Standard :
 life points & nonlethal damage

Alternative :
 wound points & vigor
option-status-all-title:
enable or disable the management of all statuses
( including Age, Armor Bonus, Encumbrance and Wound threshold)
option-status-aging-title: enable or disable the management of status related to the age of the character
option-status-armor-penalty-title: enable or disable armor penalty management for the armor pieces ( Armor Bonus and Maximum Dexterity Bonus )
option-status-encumbrance-title: enable or disable Encumbrance management for weapon, armor and equipment
option-status-wound-threshold-title: enable or disable the management of Wound threshold for the hit points
option-whisper-title:
sends Messages for dice rolls

Everyone :
 the message is sent to all players

Game Master :
 only the Game Master receives messages
status-active-encumbrance-alert: ( the Encumbrance-related statuses have been deactivated )
status-active-armor-penalty-alert: ( the Armor penalty statuses has been disabled )
status-active-wound-threshold-alert: ( the Wound threshold statuses has been disabled )
status-health-title:
state of health

Staggered :
 full-round action impossible

Out of Battle :
 full-round action impossible
 halved movement

Unconscious,Dying, Stable
 no action possible
 + effects of Helpless

Dead, Energy drained :
 no action possible
status-mental-health-title:
state of health Mental

Shaken:
 -2 to the attribute rolls
 -2 to the attack rolls
 -2 to the save rolls
 -2 to the skill rolls

Frightened:
 impossible attack
 -2 to the attribute rolls
 -2 to the save rolls
 -2 to the skill rolls

Panicked:
 impossible attack
 imposssible incantation
 full-round action impossible
 -2 to the attribute rolls
 -2 to the save rolls
 -2 to the skill rolls
status-stamina-title:
Stamina

Tired :
 impossible to run or charge
 -2 to the Strength
 -2 to the Dexterity

Exhausted :
 halved movement
 impossible to run or charge
 -6 to the Strength
 -6 to the Dexterity
status-cowering-title:
no action possible
-2 to the AC
loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC
status-helpless-title:
Dexterity = 0 ( Mod. = -5 )
-4 to the AC for melee attacks
status-prone-title:
melee attacks :
 -4 to the attack rolls
 -4 to the AC

remote attacks :
 +4 to the AC
status-fighting-defensively-title:
-4 to damage rolls
+2 to the AC
status-flat-footed-title:
impossible attack of opportunity
loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC
loss of Dexterity bonus to the CMD
status-movement-title:
Movement

Charge :
 +2 to the jostle rolls
 +2 to the attack rolls
 -2 to the AC
 loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC

Crawl :
 loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC

Entangled :
 halved movement
 impossible to run or charge
 -4 to the Dexterity
 -2 to the attack rolls
 -2 to the Dexterity
 -5 to DD to the concentration rolls

Grappled :
 impossible to move
 no action possible using both hands
 impossible attack of opportunity
 -4 to the Dexterity
 -2 to the attack rolls
 -2 to the CMB
 -2 to the CMD

Pinned :
 full-round action impossible
 impossible to move
 imposssible incantation ( somatic or material )
 -2 to the melee AC
 -2 to the remote AC
status-total-defense-title:
impossible attack of opportunity
+4 to the AC
( cannot be combined with On the defensive )
status-blinded-title:
halved movement
-4 to the Strength
-4 to the Dexterity
-2 to the AC
loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC
-4 to the Perception rolls
sight-related tests automatically fail
status-confused-title: does not differentiate between friends and enemies
status-deafened-title:
-4 to the Initiative
+20% risk of failure for spells with verbal components
automatic failure of the Hearing Perception test
-4 to the Perception rolls
status-dazzled-title:
-1 to the attack rolls
-1 to the Perception rolls
status-stunned-title:
-4 to the CMD
-2 to the AC
loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC
status-sickened-title:
-2 to the attack rolls
-2 to damage
-2 to the attribute rolls
-2 to the save rolls
-2 to the skill rolls
status-nauseated-title:
impossible attack
imposssible incantation
full-round action impossible
-4 to the Perception rolls
status-mesmerized-title:
no action possible
-4 to the reative skill rolls
status-incorporeal-title:
immune to non-magic attacks except for creatures and incorporeal effects
suffers only half the damage of weapons, items and magic spells
status-paralyzed-title:
no action possible
Force = 0 ( Mod. = -5 )
+ effects of Helpless
status-petrified-title:
no action possible
Force = 0 ( Mod. = -5 )
+ effects of Unconscious
+ effects of Helpless
status-class-barbarian-rage-title:
+4 to the Strength
+4 to the Constitution
+2 to the Willpower
-2 to the AC
no skills available ( Charisma, Dexterity or Intelligence )
status-effect-immune-physical-attack: immune to non-magic attacks except for creatures and incorporeal effects
status-effect-half-dammage-magic: suffers only half the damage of weapons, items and magic spells
status-effect-attack-failure: %s% chance of missing the attack rolls
status-effect-confused: does not differentiate between friends and enemies
status-effect-skill-perception-deafened: automatic failure of the hearing Perception test
status-effect-no-action-both-hands: no action possible using both hands
status-effect-armor-class-dexterity-bonu: loss of Dexterity bonus to the AC
status-effect-combat-maneuver-defense-de: loss of Dexterity bonus to the the CMD
status-effect-spell-verbal: %s% risk of failure of spells with verbal components
status-effect-concentration-difficulty-c: %s to DD of the Concentration rolls
status-effect-armor-class-melee: %s to the AC for melee attacks
status-effect-armor-class-ranged: %s to the AC for remote attacks
status-effect-encumbrance-roll: %s to rolls based on Strength and Dexterity ( Encumbrance )
status-effect-encumbrance-armor-class-de: maximum Dexterity bonus at %s for the AC ( Encumbrance )
status-effect-armor-proficiency: %s to rolls based on Strength and Dexterity due to untrained armour ( equipement )
character-wound-points-title: = Base ( Wound points ) + Temp. ( Wound points )
attribute-total-title: = Aging + Status ( status ) + Base + Race + Bonus - |Penalty| + Temp.
character-strength-roll-title:
Strength test
= 1d20 + Mod. + Status ( Encumbrance penalty )
character-dexterity-roll-title:
Dexterity test
= 1d20 + Mod. + Status ( Encumbrance penalty )
character-weight-base-title:
Weight Base
( depends on Race and Sex )
character-height-base-title:
Height Base
( depends on Race and Sex )
character-weight-mod-factor-title:
Weight modifier
( depends on Race and Sex )
move-tactic-title:
Tactical movement
light load = Base
medium load ≈ Base × ⅔
heavy load ≈ Base × ⅔
( depends on Status Penalty )
move-run-title:
= Tactic × ( 3 or 4 )
( depends on Load and Status Penalty )
move-lift-title:
Maximum load that can be lifted
( depends on Stance Encumbrance and Status Penalty )
move-pull-title:
Maximum load that can be pulled
= Lift × 5
( depends on Stance, Encumbrance and Status Penalty )
class-skills-per-level-title:
Skills by level
= skill points + Intelligence modifier
counter-placeholder: Heroic points, Panach, Rage, Ki reserve, ...
combat-maneuver-bonus-title:
Combat maneuver bonus
= BAB + Spe. Height. + Size Mod. + Status + Bonus - |Penalty| + Temp.
combat-maneuver-bonus-modifier-size-titl:
Size modifier
"Very tiny" to "Very small" = Dexterity modifier
"Small" to "Huge" = Strength modifier
battle-status-failure: The attack roll has %s% change to miss.
battle-status-rush: Bonus of +2 for an offensive jostle maneuver
battle-status-dexterity-mod-target-none: The target of the attacks has the flat-footed status.
battle-roll-no-target-title:
Atack test
= 1d20 ( cs > Critic ) + Total

◻ if critical success :
 critical confirmation roll
 = 1d20 + Total ( critical confirmation )
battle-roll-target-title:
Attack test
= 1d20 ( cs > Critic ) + Bas Attack
( compared to the target AC )

◻ if failure :
 no damage

◻ if success :
 Damages

◻ if critical success :
 critical confirmation roll
 = 1d20 + Total ( critical confirmation )
 ( compared to the target AC  )

 ◼ if failure :
  Damages

 ◼ if success :
  Critical damage
battle-attack-bonus-title:
Base Attack
= BAB + Mod. + Size Mod. + Status + Misc. + Temp.

total for critical confirmation
= BAB + Mod. + Size Mod. + Status + Misc. + Temp. + Crit. Bonus
battle-base-attack-bonus-title:
Base Attack Bonus
1st = first attack
2nd = full attack n°1
3rd = full attack n°2
4th = full attack n°3
battle-modifier-range-title:
Range modifier
Dexterity = ranged
Strength = melee
battle-damage-title:
Damages
= Damages + Mod. × Weapon holding + Status + Add. damages
( minimum 1 )

Critical damages
= [ Damages + Mod. × Weapon holding ]* + Status + Add. damages
( minimum 1 )
* the number of throws is the Critical factor
battle-damage-critic-roll-no-target-titl:
Critical damages test 
= Damages ( Critical damages )
battle-deathblow-roll-target-title:
Deathblow test
= Damages ( Critical damages )
( hit the target automatically )
battle-modifier-damage-title:
Modifier
not applied for projectile weapons
( except composite bows and slingshots )
spell-arcane-spell-failure-chance-h1: Risk of failure of arcane spells
spell-arcane-spell-failure-chance-armor-: risk of failure of arcane spells of the armor
spell-lvl1-per-day-title:
level 1 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl2-per-day-title:
level 2 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl3-per-day-title:
level 3 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl4-per-day-title:
level 4 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl5-per-day-title:
level 5 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl6-per-day-title:
level 6 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl7-per-day-title:
level 7 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl8-per-day-title:
level 8 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-lvl9-per-day-title:
level 9 spells
used / maximum per day
spell-status-verbal: Spells with a verbal component have a %s% higher risk of failure.
spell-status-somatic-and-material: Incantations with a gestural or material component are impossible.
spell-incantation-roll-no-target-title:
Incantation test
= 1d100
( compared to Risk of failure of arcane spells + gestural component )
( if the risk of failure of aracane spelles is not applied succeeds everty time )
spell-incantation-roll-target-title:
Incantation test
= 1d100
( compared to Risk of failure of arcane spells + gestural component )
( if the risk of failure of aracane spelles is not applied succeeds everty time )

◻ if success :
 = 1d20 + Total ( Type of incantation )
 ( compared to the target SR )

◻ if failure :
 The spell fails and it is lost
spell-melee-touch-total-title: = BAB + Mod. + Size Mod. + Status + Misc. + Temp.
spell-touch-modifier-base-attack-bonus-t:
Bas Attack Bonus
1st = first attack
2nd = full attack n°1
3rd = full attack n°2
4th = full attack n°3
spell-ranged-touch-total-title: = BAB + Mod. + Size Mod. + Status + Misc. + Temp.
spell-concentration-modifier-title:
Attribute modifier
Cha. = Charisma
Int. = Intelligence
Wis. = Wisdom
spell-damage-level-title: Damage related to the Level of the character, the spell, etc ...
spell-concentration-grappled-roll-title:
Grappled concentration test 
= 1d20 + Concentration

Difficulty Class
= 10 + target CMB - Status
spell-concentration-pinned-roll-title:
Pinned concentration test
= 1d20 + Concentration

Difficulty Class
= 10 + target CMB - Status
spell-concentration-defensive-roll-title:
on the defensive concentration test
= 1d20 + Concentration

Difficulty Class
= 15 + 2 × spell level - Status
spell-concentration-wound-roll-title:
wound concentration test
= 1d20 + Concentration

Difficulty Class
= 10 + spell level + Damages received - Status
spell-resistance-title:
Spell resistance
= CL + Racial + Spell + Object + Misc. + Temp.
spell-resistance-arcane-spell-failure-ch: Risk of failure of arcane spells is applicable ?
defense-status-half-dammage-magic: Damage from weapons, items or magic spells is reduced by half.
defense-status-immune-physical-attack: Immune to non-magic attacks except by creatures and incorporeal effects.
defense-status-sneak-attack: Subject to sneak attacks and deathblow.
spell-save-total-title: = Base + Mod. + Status + Feature + Bonus - |Penalty| + Misc.
spell-save-modifier-title:
Attribute modifier
Dex. = Dexterity
Con. = Constitution
Wis. = Wisdom
armor-proficiency-title: trained to wear this type of armor ?
weapon-proficiency-title: trained in the use of this type of weapon ?
armor-class-melee-title:
Melee armor classs
= Base + Status + Armor + Dex. + Size Mod. + Nat. + Dodge + Deflection + Misc. + Temp.
armor-class-ranged-title:
ranged armor class
= Base + Status + Armor + Dex. + Size Mod. + Nat. + Dodge + Deflection + Misc. + Temp.
armor-class-flat-footed-title:
Flat-footed armor class
◻ if Dex. <= 0 :
= Base + Armor + Dex. + Size Mod. + Nat. + Deflection + Misc. + Temp.
( ignore Dodge )

◻ if Dex. > 0 :
= Base + Armor + Size Mod. + Nat. + Deflection + Misc. + Temp.
( ignore Dex. and Dodge )
armor-class-touch-title:
Touch armor class
= Base + Dex. + Size Mod. + Dodge + Deflection + Misc. + Temp. Status
( ignore Armor and Nat. )
armor-class-armor-title:
Armor Bonus
( depends on the equipment )
combat-maneuver-defense-total-title:
Combat Maneuver Defensive
= Base + BAB + Spe. Height. + Str. + Dex. + Status + Dodge + Deflection + Misc. + Temp.
skill-status-reactive: Apply %s to the skill rolls in response to an event.
skill-status-rage: Skills using Dexterity, Intelligence or Charisma are unusable (except for Acrobatics, Horseback Riding, Intimidate and Flying).
skill-total-title: = Rank + CC + Mod. + Status + Feature + Feat + Temp.
skill-rank-title:
Rank • s spent • s
( maximum Character level )
skill-modifier-title:
Attribute modifier
Cha. = Charisma
Dex. = Dexterity
Int. = Intelligence
Str. = Strength
Wis. = Wisdom
skill-use-of-magic-objects-roll-title:
use of magic objects test
= 1d20 + Total
skill-custom-modifier-title:
Attribute modifier
Cha. = Charisma
Dex. = Dexterity
Con. = Constitution
Int. = Intelligence
Str. = Strength
Wis. = Wisdom
feat-racial-description-placeholder: Full description of the racial trait
encumbrance-charge-title:
Encumbrance
green = light load
yellow = medium load
orange = heavy load
red = overcharge
encumbrance-penalty-title:
encumbrance penalty for rolls based on Strength or Dexterity

Choice of the most restrictive between :
◻ armor penalty :
 sum of Penalty from Armor Penalty in tests
 ( varies according to armour proficiency )

◻ Encumbrance :
 light load = 0
 medium load = 3
 heavy load = 6
encumbrance-penalty-proficiency-title: penalty roll for armour worn without training
encumbrance-dexterity-ceiling-title:
maximum Dexterity bonus for the armor class

Choice of the most restrictive between :
◻ maximum Dexterity bonus :
 sum of maximum dexterity bonus of armor

◻ Maximum dexterity of the armor :
 light load = no limit
 medium load = 3
 heavy load = 1
name: Name
equipment-weapon-damage-type-title:
Damage Type
N/A = inapplicable
B = blunt
P = piecing
S = sharp
equipment-create-attack-with-this-weapon: Create an attack with this weapon
equipment-armor-dexterity-max-title:
maximum Dexterity bonus for the armor class
( leave blank if not applicable )
equipment-armor-arcane-spell-failure-cha: risk of Failure of arcane spells ( % )
rt-arcane-spell-failure-chance-ignore: ignore the risk of failure of arcane spells
rt-arcane-spell-failure-chance-title: Risk of Failure of arcane spells
